titleStmt.title: A mad vvorld, my masters As it hath bin lately in action by the Children of Paules. Composed by T.M.
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H[enry] B[allard] for Walter Burre, and are to be sold in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Crane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
